title: Photograph, View of the altar and reredos of an unidentified church, 1904–13
title_raw: View of the altar and reredos of an unidentified church
description:
Designed by Leon Dabo (1868–1960); for J. and R. Lamb Co.
Vertical rectangle: view of the chancel; statue of Mary with the Infant, far left, and St. Joseph (?), far right, under canopies. A mosaic of the Last Supper on the altar's center panel.  Above, the reredos; left, St. Peter; center, an unidentified bishop saint with scenes from his life painted below to either side on under [sic] gablets, and right, St. Paul. Spires above them.

Same church as 1961-83-16 & -18.

tombstone.epitaph:
Photograph, View of the altar and reredos of an unidentified church, 1904–13. Printed on sensitized paper. 
1961-83-17
